pageContent: Objectives: To study clinical characteristics, in terms of survival and response to treatment, of patients with non-localized prostate cancer at diagnosis in an Afro-Caribbean population from Guadeloupe.

metaData.source:
Salvage radiotherapy after radical prostatectomy: outcomes and prognostic factors especially focusing on pathological findings
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22843370/
